text: Great and affordable place to stay, but only for backpackers or group of friends. I stayed there and rent >15 pods, turns out the owner gave us the whole room so we didn't share room with other guests. Has 3 bathrooms, laundry area, living room, kitchen, and praying spot. The minus is, it didnt have elevator. Stairs only. Kinda struggling for guests with lots of lugages ðŸ¥´

There's no help when it comes to luggage carrying. No lift. Only stairs. We had a family with old people and luggage had to be carried through the stairs. The breakfast they have is only bread butter jam etc but this theme is nowhere available at this price so over all it's good if you are A bachelor
Pods aren't stabil, electronic isn't really working in the "rooms". No place for baggage and No fridge
Thank you very much untie Mey....
